title: #LearnGrowRepeat in 2016: Continuing Education Expo
desc: Start Your Year of Learning at The New School's Continuing Education Expo Featuring: FREE Info Sessions, Pop-Up Classes, Live Music Performances, Raffles, Giveaways and Campus Tours Date: Tuesday, January 12, 2016 Time: 5:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m. Location: University Center - 63 Fifth Ave., New York, NY 10003 The new you is waiting. Open the door to 2016 at The New School's Continuing Education Expo! Grab some hot cider and start your journey by learning all about our line-up of spring courses and programs. What's in store as you walk the floor?
